column4: HI, can anyone explain why when I use $ iwconfig wlan0 essid "ihaaaa" enc "xxxxxx" I get the following error? Error for wireless request "Set Encode" (8B2A) :
you need to configure your wireless for wpa here is a guide to get it going if you have any questions just ask (i did not write it the credit goes to anonymous) http://pastebin.com/m7cc580b6
